title: Deadly Bhubaneswar rooftop blast caught on camera, 2 die during treatment
desc: Investigators believe the explosion occurred while explosive materials were being handled on the rooftop. Gunpowder was recovered from the site, strengthening suspicions that crude bombs were being assembled there.

title: SENSEX recovers 400 points from day's low, NIFTY50 above 25,450; TCS, Wipro, HCL Tech gains on value buying
desc: The SENSEX recovered as much as 405 points from the day's lowest level and NIFTY50 index touched an intraday high of 25,493 after hitting a low of 25,372.

title: Woman charged with RM465,500 CBT over vehicle permit proceeds
desc: JOHOR BARU: A woman has pleaded not guilty in the Sessions Court here to five counts of criminal breach of trust (CBT) involving RM465,500 belonging to a car dealership.

title: OPTEL and Techno Service Forge Partnership to Deliver Pharmaceutical Track

title: Shotgun seized amid ongoing Onehunga shooting investigation
desc: "At this stage we are unable to confirm this firearm was involved in the original offending," Detective Senior Sergeant Matt Bunce said.

title: Woman throws straws at LiHo staff over alleged ice request in Hougang Mall; police report made
desc: A customer at a bubble tea outlet was seen throwing straws at a LiHo staff member after allegedly being denied a request for less ice on Monday (Feb 9).In a video shared on TikTok on Feb 14, a woman is seen standing at the counter of a LiHo store and throwing several straws, before escalating the incident by hurling an...

title: Brooklyn Beckham cruelly mocked over 'weird' Valentine's Day post for wife Nicola Peltz
desc: Brooklyn Beckham posted a romantic Valentine's Day tribute to wife Nicola Peltz on Instagram, but the sweet gesture was met with criticism from fans who branded it 'weird' and questioned their privacy claims

title: GameSir to launch GameHub for macOS, bringing Windows and Steam PC games to Mac
desc: GameSir has confirmed that its GameHub software is coming to macOS, expanding its PC game emulation capabilities beyond Android. Originally...

title: Beyond Rs 6 lakh crore selloff: How TCS, Infosys, other IT giants are reinventing to outlast AI disruption fears
desc: Indian IT giants are actively reinventing their strategies to counter fears of AI-driven disruption, which has led to a significant market value sell-off. Companies are embedding AI into transformation programs, focusing on outcome-led growth, and leveraging internal AI tools to maintain margins and deliver value to clients.

title: State of the URC: High-flying Sharks hunt Lions
desc: A full Vodacom URC round takes place next weekend, but first the Lions host the Sharks in a rescheduled clash in Joburg on Saturday.
